author: ate
msg: Dropping webapp-logging component (originally copied from jetspeed-2) as we voted to completely move away from using commons-logging for Apache Portals and therefore this component (as specifically targetting commons-logging usage) is no longer needed nor wished for.
whoever still wants to use this component can always take the jetspeed-webapp-logging-2.1.3.jar or even the -2.1.4.jar version once released.

author: veithen
msg: Log uncaught exceptions in WorkerPool#execute. This makes it easier to debug issues like SYNAPSE-541.

author: aconway
msg: Fix issue with python clients to cluster, mis handling of channel 0.
cpp/src/qpid/client/ConnectionImpl.cpp: allow 0 as a valid channel identifier.
python/qpid/connection.py: don't use 0 as a channel identifier.
